org.cove.jade.constraints
Interface Constraint

All Known Implementing Classes:
AngularConstraint, SpringConstraint
public interface Constraint

Interface for a constraint - something that constrains the movements of two or more particles/primitives (apart from friction, momentum, gravity or collisions). 

    JADE - JAva Dynamics Engine
    Release 0.6.1 alpha 2005-12-28
